channel.title: Router!
channel.description:
OMG i just got my router today........i was so happy until the router dident work..... ok well whenever i take the ethernet out of the computer to put into the internet port of the router it does not have any internet connection....
im totally clueless.... i ask you to plz help me!!!!! if u can help i will make u admin on my server
thank you[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 07:04:01 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Router!
item.dc:creator: @Substance Substance
item.description:
@Substance wrote:

[quote=“i0wnuall, post:1, topic:67341”]OMG i just got my router today…i was so happy until the router dident work…
ok well whenever i take the ethernet out of the computer to put into the internet port of the router it does not have any internet connection…

im totally clueless… i ask you to plz help me!!!
if u can help i will make u admin on my server

thank you[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 07:04:01 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[/quote][quote=“Rare z, post:2, topic:67341”]Lol… Ethernet is the ting that gives you internet… whats your question?[/quote]

Rare Z you honestly have to read posts before posting the spam that you post. I saw him clearly say in his post that he is not getting a connection after putting the ethernet chord into the back of the router

Ok Iownuall, First you must have a power source leading from your router into the wall. After you have verified that it is powered then connect the ethernet chord that runs from your Cable Box to your wireless router. After that is completed you then must have a chord that is connected from your CPU tower to the wireless router

Read full topic
